name: Parque Municipal Gruta do Bacaetava
address: Rua Antônio Gasparin, s/n - Bacaetava, Colombo - PR, 83451-405
description: A natural cave offering guided tours showcasing impressive rock formations and geological features.

name: Vinícola Franco Italiano
address: Rua Rodolfo Camargo, 26 - Roça Grande, Colombo - PR, 83404-040
description: A traditional winery producing award-winning wines, offering tastings and guided tours.

name: Igreja Matriz Nossa Senhora do Rosário
address: Praça Getúlio Vargas, s/n - Centro, Colombo - PR, 83414-000
description: A church built in 1899, replicating Italian architecture, reflecting the faith of Italian immigrants.

name: Morro da Cruz
address: Estrada da Ribeira, km 20 - Jardim Monza, Colombo - PR, 83402-000
description: The highest point in Colombo, offering panoramic views and hosting annual religious events.

name: Casa da Cultura
address: Rua XV de Novembro, 105 - Centro, Colombo - PR, 83414-000
description: The former city council building, now hosting cultural exhibitions and events.

name: Memorial do Imigrante Italiano – Casa Eugênio Mottin
address: Rua Marechal Floriano Peixoto, s/n - Centro, Colombo - PR, 83414-000
description: A relocated 1922 house representing Italian immigrants, showcasing historical artifacts.

name: Parque Municipal da Uva
address: Rua Marechal Floriano Peixoto, 8771 - Centro, Colombo - PR, 83414-000
description: A park hosting the annual Grape Festival, featuring facilities like trails, playgrounds, and event spaces.

name: Museu Municipal Cristóforo Colombo
address: Rua XV de Novembro, 105 - Centro, Colombo - PR, 83414-000
description: A museum housing collections from the indigenous era to the present, highlighting local history.
